name: Gong Scourers
description: A guild of workers who clean and maintain public gongs and bells; adventurers can learn about local communication systems, hire signal services, or investigate unusual sounds.
atmosphere: The workshop is filled with the metallic scent of polished brass and the sharp tang of cleaning materials. The sound of gongs being tested and the rhythmic work of maintenance creates a methodical, service-oriented atmosphere. The air carries the promise of clear communication and the essential nature of public signaling.
